Abū ʿĪsā Muḥammad ibn ʿĪsā as-Sulamī aḍ-Ḍarīr al-Būghī at-Tirmidhī (Arabic: أبو عيسى محمد بن عيسى السلمي الضرير البوغي الذر: 8) October 9: 8.  akpọrọ Imām at-Termezī/Tirmidhī, bụ ọkà mmụta islam, na onye na-anakọta hadith sitere na Termez (nke mbụ Khorasan na Uzbekistan nke ugbu a).  O dere al-Jami` as-Sahih (nke a maara dị ka Jami` at-Tirmidhi), otu n'ime mkpokọta akwụkwọ nsọ isii na Sunni Islam.  O dekwara Shama'il Muhammadiyah (nke a na-akpọ Shama'il at-Tirmidhi), mkpokọta hadiths gbasara mmadụ na agwa onye amụma Alakụba, Muhammad.  At-Tirmidhi marakwa ụtọ ụtọ asụsụ Arabic nke ọma, na-akwado ụlọ akwụkwọ Kufa karịa Basra n'ihi nchekwa nke mbụ nke uri Arabic dị ka isi mmalite..
